-// Miscellaneous
-
-// Visual Studio 2005 deprecates POSIX names - use ISO C++ names instead
-#define open _open
-#define close _close
-#define read  _read
-#define write _write
-#define lseek _lseek
-#define unlink _unlink
-#define strdup _strdup
